testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlNodeInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.4.1.1 [Need for Node Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send Node Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.4.2.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N10R225_Send_Node_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N10R225_Send_Node_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Name - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Direction is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Node Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Number of Links is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.4.2.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 17 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlNodeInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N10R225_Send_Node_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 18 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 18.1 VERIFY that a nodeInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 18.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item
Step 18.3 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.4 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.5 VERIFY that a node-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.6 IF TMDD_N10R231_Restrictions___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.6.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item
Step 18.7 IF TMDD_N10R232_Roadway_Network_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.7.1 VERIFY that a network-name data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.8 IF TMDD_N10R233_Node_Name___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.8.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.9 IF TMDD_N10R234_Node_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.9.1 VERIFY that a node-description data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.10 IF TMDD_N10R235_Route_Designator___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.10.1 VERIFY that a node-route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.11 IF TMDD_N10R236_Node_Direction_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.11.1 VERIFY that a node-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.12 IF TMDD_N10R237_Linear_Reference___Node_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.12.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.12.2 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.13 IF TMDD_N10R238_Node_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.13.1 VERIFY that a node-type data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.14 IF TMDD_N10R239_Number_of_Links_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.14.1 VERIFY that a node-links-number data element exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.15 IF TMDD_N10R240_Node_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 18.15.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame nodeInventoryMsg.node-inventory-item.node-inventory-list.node
Step 18.16 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 19 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 19.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 19.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 19.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 19.7 IF TMDD_N10R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 19.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 20 EXIT
